name: Prisoner
description: You are a Prisoner. In a strange place with many rooms. You hear a noise, as if something is moving around. Move from one room to another, avoid deadly traps and try to escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
